Asset Analysis App: Visit here
This tool allows users to analyze and compare the returns of financial assets. All calculations are based on daily adjusted closing prices, fetched directly from Yahoo Finance using the yfinance API.

Poker Tournaments Simulation Tool: Visit here
I created a Monte Carlo simulation in Python that models Spin and Go tournaments using the same payout structure as real tournaments. The simulation derives a playerâ€™s probability of winning a game from their expected average chips won per game (Chip EV). For players who do not finish first, the model assumes equal probabilities of finishing second or third.
